languages.text: {n}Ульфар одной рукой сжимает оберег, другой — оружие, изготовленное для драки. Вы слышите его напряженный шепот:{/n} "Призрачный волк, защити мою душу от ужасов варпа и злобы рассерженных духов".

{n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар одной рукой сжимает оберег, другой — оружие, изготовленное для драки. Вы слышите его напряженный шепот:{/n} "Призрачный волк, защити мою душу от ужасов варпа и злобы рассерженных духов".

{n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法一只手紧紧地握着护符，另一只手握着武器，做好了战斗的准备。你听到他紧张地低语着。{/n}“灵狼啊，保护我的灵魂，让我免受亚空间恐怖与愤怒的恶灵所害。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法一只手紧紧地握着护符，另一只手握着武器，做好了战斗的准备。你听到他紧张地低语着。{/n}“灵狼啊，保护我的灵魂，让我免受亚空间恐怖与愤怒的恶灵所害。”

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは片方の手でチャームを、そしてもう一方の手で戦闘態勢にある武器を掴んだ。彼が緊迫した様子で囁く。{/n}「スピリット・ウルフよ、<歪み>の恐怖と怒れる精霊から俺の魂を保護してくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは片方の手でチャームを、そしてもう一方の手で戦闘態勢にある武器を掴んだ。彼が緊迫した様子で囁く。{/n}「スピリット・ウルフよ、<歪み>の恐怖と怒れる精霊から俺の魂を保護してくれ」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar serre son amulette dans une main et son arme de combat dans l'autre. Vous l'entendez murmurer d'une voix tendue :{/n} « Esprit du Loup, protège mon âme des terreurs du Warp et du courroux des esprits en colère. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar serre son amulette dans une main et son arme de combat dans l'autre. Vous l'entendez murmurer d'une voix tendue :{/n} « Esprit du Loup, protège mon âme des terreurs du Warp et du courroux des esprits en colère. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar agarra su amuleto con una mano y su arma con la otra. Lo escuchas susurrar con preocupación:{/n} «Lobo Espiritual, protege mi alma de los horrores de la disformidad y la ira de los espíritus».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar agarra su amuleto con una mano y su arma con la otra. Lo escuchas susurrar con preocupación:{/n} «Lobo Espiritual, protege mi alma de los horrores de la disformidad y la ira de los espíritus».

languages.text: {n}Ulfar umfasst mit einer Hand seinen Glücksbringer und mit der anderen seine kampfbereite Waffe. Du hörst ihn angespannt flüstern:{/n} "Geisterwolf, schütze meine Seele vor den Schrecken des Warps und dem Zorn wütender Geister."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar umfasst mit einer Hand seinen Glücksbringer und mit der anderen seine kampfbereite Waffe. Du hörst ihn angespannt flüstern:{/n} "Geisterwolf, schütze meine Seele vor den Schrecken des Warps und dem Zorn wütender Geister."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar bir eliyle muskasını, diğer eliyle savaşa atılmaya hazır silahını kavrıyor. Gergince fısıldadığını duyuyorsun:{/n} "Ruh Kurt, beni öteboyutun dehşetlerinden ve öfkeli ruhların hiddetinden koru."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his charm with one hand and his battle-ready weapon with the other. You hear him whisper tensely,{/n} "Spirit Wolf, shield my soul from the terrors of the warp and the ire of angered spirits."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar bir eliyle muskasını, diğer eliyle savaşa atılmaya hazır silahını kavrıyor. Gergince fısıldadığını duyuyorsun:{/n} "Ruh Kurt, beni öteboyutun dehşetlerinden ve öfkeli ruhların hiddetinden koru."
